name: io.github.jifrozen0110/mcp-riot
description: MCP-Riot is a community-developed Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that integrates with the Riot Games API to provide League of Legends data to AI assistants via natural language queries.

tools.name: get_player_summary
tools.description: Summarizes level, rank, top champions, and recent matches.

tools.name: get_top_champions_tool
tools.description: Returns top champions by mastery points.

tools.name: get_champion_mastery_tool
tools.description: Returns mastery details for a specific champion.

tools.name: get_recent_matches_tool
tools.description: Returns recent matches for the given summoner.

tools.name: get_match_summary
tools.description: Returns match performance stats for a given match ID and puuid.
